mapper.select: SELECT userno FROM comment WHERE gno = #{value} AND ono = 0 AND nested = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat WHERE to_id = #{value} AND checkmessage = 1;

SELECT a.announceno, a.my_userno, a.friends_userno, a.boardno, a.tablename, a.board_or_comment, u.nickname, a.regdate, if(a.board_or_comment = 0, b.title,if(a.board_or_comment BETWEEN 1 AND 2, c.content, null)) as content FROM announce as a left JOIN ( SELECT board_no as board_no, title, userno , 1 as tablename FROM free_board UNION SELECT concern_board_no as board_no, title, userno ,2 as tablename FROM concern_board UNION SELECT image_board_no as board_no, title, userno, 3 as tablename FROM image_board UNION SELECT video_board_no as board_no, title, userno, 4 as tablename FROM video_board ) as b ON a.boardno = b.board_no AND a.tablename = b.tablename LEFT JOIN comment AS c ON a.friends_userno = c.userno AND a.commentno = c.comment_no LEFT JOIN user AS u ON a.friends_userno = u.userno where a.my_userno = #{value} AND a.read_check = 1;
SELECT count(*) FROM announce WHERE my_userno = #{value} AND read_check = 1
